title: Simulation/VR-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Course in Online Collaborative Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A course for in-service secondary teachers to collaboratively share math problem-solving strategies in VR simulation environments using collaboration tools.

learning_goals: Learners can derive three or more mathematical problem-solving strategies with peer teachers using online collaborative learning tools (forums, real-time chat, shared whiteboards).
Learners can mathematically model real-life problems and propose solutions through collaborative inquiry in VR simulation environments.
Learners can perform peer and self-assessments via a feedback system, revise problem-solving processes two or more times by establishing improvement plans.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
